title: KANDNW/KANDNB/KANDNQ/KANDND â€” Bitwise Logical AND NOT Masks

fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`KANDNW k1, k2, k3`
`KANDNB k1, k2, k3`
`KANDNQ k1, k2, k3`
`KANDND k1, k2, k3`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Performs a bitwise AND NOT between the vector mask k2 and the vector mask k3, and writes the result into vector mask k1.

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
